data.title: Assignment On IBM
data.meta_description: Assignment on IBM - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. IBM was founded in 1888 and is now a global technology company operating in over 170 countries. It has transitioned from manufacturing punch card machines and mainframe computers to developing software, servers, storage, consulting and other IT services. IBM aims to lead in advanced information technologies and translate these into value for customers. Its mission is dedication to client success, innovation that matters, and trust in relationships. IBM seeks revenue growth through new markets and acquisitions while improving productivity. It offers a wide range of products and services and faces competitive pressures from companies like Microsoft and HP.
